channel.title: I'm sorry
channel.description:
Just to start out: My old username was Full Metalst. I think I got banned for "trading rep" and the ban isn't set to expire, because I made multiple accounts. I just wanted to let you guys know that I'm done with my ignorant ways. I was banned for about a year or two. And I'm asking to please either unban that account or to let this account stay. I promise that if I receive another "infraction" and get banned, then I'll stay banned, and not make any new accounts. :)
And again, I apologize.

item.title: I'm sorry
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

According to the ban message, it was just rep trading. And it really was nearly two years ago.
I’ll post in the staff section to see what everyone else thinks.

Read full topic

I’m not a rep whore lol. I’m not even sure if that was the reason. I don’t give a shit about rep lol.
[/quote]rep++
[/quote]daMN how did u rep him 57 points?! HACKERRRRRRRR[/quote]
He’s now masturbating.
